#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides google-chrome #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin: export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) if mountpoint -q /opt/google/chrome ; then printf "$bold===> Skipping Chrome, already mounted $normal\n" else printf "$bold===> Preparing Chrome $normal\n" if [ -f /lesslinux/blob/google-chrome.sqs ] ; then mount -o loop /lesslinux/blob/google-chrome.sqs /opt/google/chrome umount /usr/share/applications/google-chrome.desktop elif [ -f /lesslinux/blob/google-chrome-stable_current_i386.deb ] ; then mount -o size=200M,mode=0755 -t tmpfs tmpfs /opt/google/chrome ar -p /lesslinux/blob/google-chrome-stable_current_i386.deb data.tar.lzma \ | unlzma -c | tar -C / -x ./opt/google/chrome umount /usr/share/applications/google-chrome.desktop else mount --bind /dev/null /usr/share/applications/google-chrome.desktop fi fi ;; stop) printf "$bold===> Removing Chrome, freeing memory $normal\n" umount /opt/google/chrome && mount --bind /dev/null /usr/share/applications/google-chrome.desktop ;; esac
